title: Bug 124570 - Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session
description: Bug 124570 - Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session
OB: When clicking on the Preview button on the toolbar after opening the Sales Invoice report, the Product Catalog report is displayed instead.
EB: After opening the Sales Invoice report and clicking on the Preview button again, the Sales Invoice report should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the problem:
1. Start BIRT 2.0 RC2 and create a project.
2. Import the attached two designs into the project.
3. Open the Product Catalog and click on the Preview button on the toolbar to view the report.
4. Close the viewer.
5. Open the Sales Invoice report and click on the Preview button again.
